newest.message:
# Release v4.0.7
## Bug Fixes - Update Help menu to new websites - Fix missing EVE Marketer prices - Fix potential exception on first run for a given character - Fix potential crash when sorting items in inaccessible structures - Fix broken EVE Marketer link in About window
## Contributors - Peter Han - goldengnu - wbSD

release.message:
# Release v4.0.8
## New Features - Character location can be shown in the overview. Defaults to hidden. - Custom labels can be added to charaters. Defaults to blank.
## Bug Fixes - Update text for "Skill Queue Less Than Threshold" warning - Suppress spurious warnings from NPC corporations - Show failing character name if SSO login has expired or is now invalid - Marshal, Pacifier, and Enforcer are now visible in Ship Browser
## Contributors - Peter Han - nathan-bell - wvdvegt - lps1975
